name: Relictacat
description:
Relictacat is a single-player 3D adventure game that can be played on mobile devices. The game is inspired by Stray (BlueTwelve, 2022) which became a phenomenon. The game begins with a cutscene where a cat, or in this case the player, is abandoned on the side of the road for unknown reasons. When the cat goes to the forest nearby the road and wanders there, she suddenly discovers a weak puppy. 

Save yourself and the puppy.
